en.title: FusionExcel Celebrates with Superstars in Bangkok, 27th June 2009 (1).
en.content:
FE celebrated the Golden Wedding Anniversary (50 years) of Thai Superstar Actor Sombat Methanee and his wife Kanchana Methanee on the 27th June 2009 with a Gala Dinner at Convention Hall, JJ Mall, Chatuchak, Bangkok. The Gala Event, sponsored by FE, was attended by 1,000 guests, including FE Leaders, Members, Celebrities, VIPs and Newspaper and TV media. The Masters of Ceremony were well known TPBS Radio and TV Station presenters, Suphachon Klinsuwan and Dr Rungthip Chatenaphalai.

Among the VIP Guests and Celebrities who attended are Paul Ting, KS Lee, Don Chan, KC Phoon, Sam Ho, Veerayuth Ditsayasarin (Son-in-law of Thai King), Pancake Kamanit Jamikorn (Superstar Actress), Prof Dr Wichit Boonyahotara PhD, Pol Maj Gen Angkoon Arthornphatai, Pramuan Puchanaseri (Former Minister), Pol General Darun Sotthiphan, Pol Gen Sunthorn Saikhwan, Pol Gen Seri Temiyawet, Pol Gen Sawas Amornwiwat, Lt General Suphachai Photongnak, General Phalangkoon Klaharn, General Prayoon Moedet, Lt General Somchai Chanayothin, Surachai Sombatcharoen (Singer), Winai Phanthurak (Singer), Thippawan (Singer), Ampa Poosit (Actress), Sainam Daensawan (Singer), Sedtha Sirashaya (Actor), Aranya Naamvong (Actress), Daam Dasakorn (Actor), Suriya Shinnapan (Actor), Aswin Rattanapracha (Actor), Yordchai Meksuwan (Actor), Pissamai Wilasak (Actor), Rit Luecha (Actor), Kecha Plianwithi (Actor).

- Opening Procession led by Thai children in international dresses of 10 Asian countries.

- Opening Speech by FE Thailand Country Licensee Don Chan.

- Speech by Sombat and Kanchana Methanee on "Endless Love".

- Congratulation tributes by Veerayuth Ditsayasarin, Paul Ting, KS Lee, KC Phoon, Sam Ho, Rev
  Dr VeerachaiKoware, Daam Dasakorn, Suriya Shinnapan, Sedtha Sirashaya, Aranya Naamvong.

- Elvis impersonation and song by Pol Maj Gen Angkoon Arthornphatai.

- Tribute songs by Pancake, Don Chan, Rit Luecha and daughter, Surachai Sombatcharoen, Winai
  Phanthurak, Thippahawan, Daam Dasakorn, Sainam Daensawan. 

- Speech by Don Chan on FE's "Hope For Children" Charity for Thailand.

- Quantum Pendant demo by KC Phoon.

- Lucky Draws.

A BIG THANK YOU to FE Thailand Country Licensee Don Chan and team for yet another SUCCESSFUL event!
 
< Click Here For More Photos >

The Gala Event, sponsored by FE, was attended by 1,000 guests, including FE Leaders, Members, Celebrities, VIPs and Newspaper and TV media . The Masters of Ceremony were well known TPBS Radio and TV Station presenters, Suphachon Klinsuwan and Dr Rungthip Chatenaphalai.
